post_info.post_title: Who thinks violent video games influence children of today

My little brother is screwed up from playing lots of halo.

Who isn't tweaked from playing violent games? 
 But they're so much fun.I guess It can't be helped or can it?
 Well I don't know.

Anybody? emoticon_confused

 
 
 
 Video games have an influence on the kids that play them, but it is not an excuse for kids to go out and re-enact what they see. That is just a lame cover up for bad parenting. It is the parents' job to monitor what games their kids are playing. And it is the job of the employee at the video game store to abide by the rating of the game...don't sell a Mature Audience game to a 7 year old. If the parents want their kids to play the game, then fine, let the parents buy the game. It is the parents duty to inform their kid that what is in the game is fake/illegal, and that if he tries to do what he sees in the game that he will be punished.
Shh...Don't give my mom any ideas... ;) ;)

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Who thinks violent video games influence children of today
